comments: Stewart is a very good prof he care about his student, I am new to canada and English and I had very hard time adapting to English and to the Culture, Stewart did helped a lot by providing me people that I can go to if I feel overwholem also he was available when ever we need him. Very good professor!

comments: Stewart is the best seminar teacher I think I will ever have in my 4 years of nursing. He is very kind and funny, and gives great feedback. He is very approachable when you are confused and he will clarify any questions that you may have. I wish I could have him for all of my future seminars.

comments: As a tutor, Stewart had a lot of relevant experience to share. I feel as though he is a better tutor than lecturer. He allowed us to experiment with how we proceeded in tutorial and contributed when relevant. Had a tendency to get sidetracked at times with stories and experiences, but overall, a good tutor.

comments: Tough course, but fair. Probably would not like this course if you are a poor student.

tag_professor: Hilarious (4)  Caring (3)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (2)  Participation matters (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Inspirational (1)  Respected (1)
comments: This is the second course I have taken with Mr. MacLennan. At first I enjoyed his humorous personality and enthusiasm. However, this has changed. He is disorganized and his lectures lack substance. He tests on random facts versus knowledge that is actually necessary to be a successful nurse. He can be rude when you ask for geedback or help.

tag_professor: Hilarious (4)  Caring (3)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (2)  Participation matters (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Inspirational (1)  Respected (1)
comments: Humorous and knowledgeable, but tends to get sidetracked during lectures with stories. Somewhat disorganized - it shows in his quizzes and exams. Great personality but I feel he is not very well suited to lecturing.

tag_professor: Hilarious (4)  Caring (3)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (2)  Participation matters (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Inspirational (1)  Respected (1)
comments: What an absolute disappointment. His lectures go on for ages, and deviate so far from the curriculum and level of 2nd year students that it\'s hardly worth it to sit through them. Read the textbook instead. If you ask him for assistance, don\'t expect him to be helpful, or polite. It\'s difficult to believe all these positive ratings, to be honest.

comments: Below comments are simply insulting. Professor MacLennan has a lot of experience in clinical areas especially mental health and care to share those experience with us.

comments: He mumbles so hard you can\'t understand a thing at the back of class. His stories go on for hours but if you\'re able to listen through them you might learn something. Good luck.

comments: Not helpful at all. You shouldn\'t even bother going to class. Just read the textbook.

tag_professor: Hilarious (4)  Caring (3)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (2)  Participation matters (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Inspirational (1)  Respected (1)
comments: Stewart is hilarious. He made both lab and pharm fun. I appreciated his sense of humour and that we were allowed to laugh and have fun, but that we also did learn what we needed to learn. I really miss him and wish more of our instructors were like him.

tag_professor: Hilarious (4)  Caring (3)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (2)  Participation matters (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Inspirational (1)  Respected (1)
comments: Stewart is an interesting tutor who does have a vast amount of knowledge. The pre-lab quizzes, however, are a complete disaster and the lay out of the labs is also very confusing. Stewart himself is a good tutor but his management of the labs is not ideal.

tag_professor: Hilarious (4)  Caring (3)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (2)  Participation matters (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Inspirational (1)  Respected (1)
comments: What a character! Great teacher, but can be quite arrogant, plus, the pre-lab quizzes (which are his responsibility) dent his overall rating as they haven\'t been "updated" in years and content not covered in class/readings is asked in quizzes.

tag_professor: Hilarious (4)  Caring (3)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (2)  Participation matters (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Inspirational (1)  Respected (1)
comments: Stewart is great !! He knows what he is talking about and is hilariously sarcastic. He makes the 3 hour labs fun and but also knows when to buckle down and really make sure that we are understanding the material and assessments. Miss him already!

tag_professor: Hilarious (4)  Caring (3)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (2)  Participation matters (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Inspirational (1)  Respected (1)
comments: Stewart\'s great! Very entertaining, knows his stuff. Gets mixed up fairly often in class, but it\'s all there in the notes, and if it somehow gets too confused he\'ll leave it off the exam. The on person who rated him low obviously just didn;t study enough...
